attributes.action: change the way EMA is assessed to allow fairer applications for people going to higher education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: EMA is currently assessed only on the household income and this needs to change.  EMA should be assessed to the situation the household is in, for example, if paents earn £35,000 between them but have five dependants then this should be assessed aswell to make the system a lot fairer for struggling households
